data.title: Food was Average and service not much better
data.text:
We had been eager to go to Teresa's because of all the good reviews.  What a let-down.  First off, the waiter was a little rude.  When asked a question, he acted like it was a great effort to respond.  We had to wait a long time to get the bill at the end of our meal, too.

Anyway - - we ordered a Margarita and a Sam Adams on tap.  The beer was fine but the Margarita was pretty weak.  It could have used another shot of tequila. 

We ordered a "Pick Two Combo" consisting of a Beef Taco and a Chicken Quesadilla. The quesadilla was placed on top of the taco, turning the taco shell into mush.  Both were simply average and no more.

Our other orders were Jalapeno Poppers, which we rated a 7 on a 1 to 10, and Teresa's Favorite DIP, which was more like Teresa's Favorite SOUP.  It was so thin and watery that  you couldn't really dip anything in it.  If you tried to put it on the flour tortilla they gave you, it was like putting a spoonful of liquid with a few chunks on the tortilla - quite messy!  We intended to ask the waiter if it was normally this thin and watery, but he never came back until we were long done eating and had requested the bill.

Our bill was reasonable - - $39 plus tip.  But the food was so unimpressive that we would probably never return.

data.title: Great Food
data.text: Stopped on our drive up to Minneapolis.  Found this place and was pleasantly surprised by the great authentic mexican food here.  The have a special taco menu that was fantastic.  We all tried different kinds and were stuffed.

data.title: Great Mexican Restaurant
data.text: This has been a family favorite of our for years.  We bring friends and family here.  Have some quesso with chips to start along with a margarita and you can't go wrong.

data.title: Wow!
data.text: I'll admit, I was a little worried to stop here and eat, but OMG! Absolutely scrumptious food!! Husband and I both got a Chimi, I got an enchilada and him a quesadilla. The chips and salsa were also really good and our server was awesome too! Very respectful and quick! It's a must!

data.title: Happy hour
data.text: I enjoy happy hour here they have some decent drink specials and they always have free chips and salsa most the time the salsa is really good well prepared but there has been a few times where it's a little bit late not much spice the service here is excellent and they do a great job of keeping the place clean one of my favorite things on the menu is the chicken soup I know it sounds crazy but it's really good

data.title: One Meal Can Easily Feed Two!
data.text: We eat at Theresa's frequently, because the food is great, the service is prompt and courteous, and the amount of food is generous. We ordered a lunch fajita and it was more than enough for us both! Outstanding!

data.title: Mexican
data.text: Teresa's is a family friendly place.  When we were there they had lots of trays set up on a table for bringing to a catering event.  Let's you know people like it enough to hire them to cater.  For our order the portions were smaller than other Mexican restaurants.  Good food though and priced about right, not too expensive.

data.title: Superb Mexican
data.text: Menu is very diverse from traditional Mexican food to more Americanized.   Bar selection and margaritas are a great value.  Extremely kid friendly.

data.title: Dinner and drinks
data.text:
Margaritas and daquairis are great! The queso con carne dip is to die for.

Food portions are large and I usually take home leftovers! It's a nice place to eat if your craving Mexican food!

data.title: Stay home and make your own!
data.text:
So, there are so many people I know that actually like Teresa's, I will start with the positives. The location is convenient, there seems to be ample parking in the lot. They have huge beers on their happy hour special but here is where it goes south....The margaritas are not good, they use some blended slushie machine mix and they taste terrible. Even when you order a top shelf margarita, No Bueno! Not to mention the margaritas are over priced. 

Our server was friendly, but not quick to greet us and being that the restaurant was not busy at all, the service was not very prompt. There were maybe two other tables in the restaurant and the bar was also quiet, it was mid week. It took forever for our drinks to come to the table. Then, when we ordered our food, we both ordered burritos, the food came to the table in a matter of under 5 minutes...the plates were piping hot but our food was cold and there was very little chicken in the burrito, mostly all filler...rice and such. 

Unfortunately, this was the second time we have gone there only to be disappointed so while we always like to give a place a second chance, we will not be back.

data.title: Great food and service
data.text: Always can count on speedy and polite service. Food is hot and good. Never disappointed at Teresa's!

data.title: Dinner
data.text: The staff is always cheerful and constantly in motion serving customers.  Chips and salsa are immediately brought to your table when you arrive.  You can go there for a quick dinner if you are in a hurry or you can enjoy a more leisurely dinner if you prefer.  Either way the service is the same- excellent.

data.title: Great lunch and service
data.text: Food is always good and we feel service is best weekdays at lunch. Chipotle chicken, chimichangas and chicken Aroz con pollo is amazing.

data.title: Always Excellent
data.text: We go to Teresa's monthly or more.  The food is very good quality and is always excellent!  They have excellent margaritas as well.  Family Favorite!

data.title: Family lunch
data.text: We had a good meal at Teresa's today.  It's not the best I've ever had, but we had no real complaints about it either. Definitely a good amount of food for the money...

data.title: Good food and service
data.text: Have eaten here numerous times.  Never disappointed.  Very nice bar as well.  I really enjoy the shrimp tacos.  The service has always been good.

data.title: Good Food
data.text: Always good food! Sometimes busy and takes a little bit of time to get a table but the quality of the food makes up for that.

data.title: Great Food, Service Lately is a Hit or Miss
data.text: This is one of my favorite places to eat but lately the service hasn't been great. I love the chips and salsa especially with a side of cheese dip and the rest of the food I have tried has been good as well. There is one particular server though that if I walk in and see I consider walking out because we always have him when he is there. He is rude and rolls his eyes if you ask for more chips or a to go box and doesn't have a friendly personality whatsoever. This has deterred us from eating here as often as we used to.

data.title: Great Mexican food
data.text: Teresa's always provides good Mexican meals at a reasonable cost. We have been there several times and I've always enjoyed our food there and we always feel like we get a good value for money.I would recommend it. The staff is always really friendly and more than willing to take your order.

data.title: Fast and Flavorful!
data.text: Teresa's in Lakeville is a every-Friday stop for us at my work. The food is always lightning fast and tastes great!  You will not be disappointed spending your money here. Lindos Special is a favorite for lunch or dinner!!
